actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an Inspector General for the judicial branch, and for other purposes.
short_title: Judicial Transparency and Ethics Enhancement Act of 2017
subjects: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

summary.text:
Judicial Transparency and Ethics Enhancement Act of 2017

This bill amends the federal judicial code to establish the Office of Inspector General for the Judicial Branch to investigate alleged misconduct in the judicial branch, including the Supreme Court; to conduct and supervise audits and investigations; and to prevent and detect waste, fraud, and abuse.

titles.title: Judicial Transparency and Ethics Enhancement Act of 2017

A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an Inspector General for the judicial branch, and for other purposes.
